content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt.
name: Max Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for an apartment in München.
name: Max Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: [Question] What was the final agreed upon price?
name: Max Müller

content: Yes, we agreed on a final price.
name: Evaluator

content: [Question] What was the final agreed upon price?
name: Max Müller

content: The final agreed upon price was 1.200 Euros per month.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] How did you reach this final price?

[Answer] We reached the final price of 1.200 Euros per month through a series of negotiations, where we discussed our respective needs and circumstances. I, as a potential tenant, offered my maximum budget, and Mr. Schmidt, as the landlord, negotiated for the value of his property. We reached a compromise that was satisfactory for both parties.
name: Max Müller

content: [Question] On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Mr. Schmidt, as an 8.
name: Max Müller

content: [Question] At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] No, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation.
name: Max Müller
